title: Veritas Technologies LLC
content: • Converted over 8 Legacy pages written in ExtJS to Angular 8 using Angular Material and .Net for back-end / APIs • Built a utility to convert JSON data from MS-Teams into Rich HTML formatted emails in Java, HTML, and CSS • Updated and added validations to a legacy Web UI written in EXT JS

title: Veritas Technologies LLC
content: • Built multiple Commandlets as a command-line alternative to Veritas' Backup and Recovery solutions in Windows Powershell• Created templates for interactive performance reports in PowerBI

title: TomTom India Pvt. Ltd.
content: • Built various UI Elements of the TomTom Web App used by users to provide mapping data in Angular• Worked with TomTom Map SDK to create various filters and accessibility options for the aforementioned TomTom web-app

title: Google Developer Student Clubs VIT, Pune
content: • Core team member of a technical student club powered by Google Developers aimed at helping other students learn upcoming technologies and building usable software for local businesses • Trained a class of 60 in basic Machine Learning algorithms in Python, Numpy, Pandas, MatPlotLib, and Tensorflow @ MLFest 2019 • Trained a class of 50 in a crash course to programming in Python @ DSC Python Workshop 2019

title: CPAG Graphology Experts, Nashik
content: • Interned with a team of 5 students and worked on analyzing and finding possible vulnerabilities in Fortune 500 websites using FTP probing and DoS scripts
